channel.title: Need a Banner for my server!
channel.description: Hi, I am the owner of Lost Empire. I can make banners but I want one thats a .GIF That Flashes and does all kind of kewl effects. This was my old (bad) banner that I made. It would be nice if you could put the stuff on my old banner to the new one please :D [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2mn10k4.jpg[/img] Things that need to be updated in the banner - I have added chickens, and have Donator Zone(s). That's pretty much it. :P

item.title: Need a Banner for my server!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Make It Yourself
http://www.webestools.com/banner-animated-maker-generator-gif-banners-free-online.html

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Banner for my server!
